description: This along with Ghostwriter are my favorite editors... very powerful too! Sometimes, I use Evernote too cause that app is solid as well.
The version here is way tooo old.
Very simple design and use. Exactly what I was looking for
This is an excellent piece of software that should be ubiquitous.
I have everything scaled to 200%, but this snap version of Typora doesn't respect that, or my chosen cursor. I'd recommend installing the repo they provide on their website.
summary: Seems to install fine, but behaves weirdly

description: Jit 'just in time' rendering is very helpful
summary: nice the jit preview mode is great

description: After using a couple of different markdown editors, this one just felt correct, ergonomic, simple yet complete.
summary: One of the best mardown editors around

description: This is easily one of the best markdown editors out there. However, for this version of the snap there is no way to allow it to access files from an external drive(usb).

No other word processor I've used manages to pack so many useful features in while maintaining such a clean, distraction-free working environment. Editing and formatting a document is so intuitive using their version of Markdown and I quickly picked up some basic CSS to make a few pretty themes for different purposes. What's more, the integrations with other code systems is seamless and so helpful for anyone who needs for advanced rendering - I've had all sorts of fun with LaTeX and mermaid making diagrams. And it's free!
summary: I am in love with this software

description: The one thing i don't like is the missing menu. Or maybe it has now changed.
summary: Markdown is great and this app helps make it better

description: It's great for making documents, but the snap doesn't seem to ask for permission to use printers, so there is no way to print any of those documents.

Fedora 30,
de por ahí podría mejorar el explorador de archivos para abrir documentos.

Para mí el mejor editor de md que existe actualmente.
Sirve para todo, desde escribir una nota, un post o una novela. 
Lo aguanta todo.

This is the first time in ten years, I lost data on an editor. It freezes the screen, you have to restart gnome-shell (by closing my laptop screen otherwise maintan poweroff button), and when you reopen your file, you've lost even things that where already saved.
summary: Awful, slow, buggy, loss of data
